nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,62 @@
+=============
+Release 0.237
+=============
+
+General Changes
+_______________
+* Fix NPE in common sub-expression optimization triggered by CASE-WHEN expression.
+* Fix compiler failure with function type when common sub-expression optimization is enabled.
+* Add JSON format for `EXPLAIN` with type `LOGICAL` and `DISTRIBUTED`.
+* Add functions :func:`array_sum` and :func:`map_normalize`.
+* Add new session property ``warning_handling `` to control how warnings are handled. The options are ``SUPPRESS``, ``NORMAL`` and ``AS_ERROR``. The default value is ``NORMAL``.
+* Add support for Druid's basic and kerberos authentication.
+* Add support for defining SQL-invoked functions in plugins.
+* Added a new aggregation function SET_AGG<T> that returns ARRAY<T> - equivalent to ARRATY_AGG(DISTINCT).
+* COUNT(DISTINCT) suggests using approx_distinct instead.
+* Introducing NodeStatusService interface to find out if a worker is in maintenance mode or ready to take tasks. Default behavior is no op. But can be implemented and override the

nodes.bodyText:
general comment, it will be good if we put functionality changes at the top and fixes at the bottom of each section.

According to the order of changes specified here: https://github.com/prestodb/presto/wiki/Release-Notes-Guidelines#order-of-changes, the fixes come first.

@@ -0,0 +1,62 @@
+=============
+Release 0.237
+=============
+
+General Changes
+_______________
+* Fix NPE in common sub-expression optimization triggered by CASE-WHEN expression.
+* Fix compiler failure with function type when common sub-expression optimization is enabled.
+* Add JSON format for `EXPLAIN` with type `LOGICAL` and `DISTRIBUTED`.
+* Add functions :func:`array_sum` and :func:`map_normalize`.
+* Add new session property ``warning_handling `` to control how warnings are handled. The options are ``SUPPRESS``, ``NORMAL`` and ``AS_ERROR``. The default value is ``NORMAL``.
+* Add support for Druid's basic and kerberos authentication.
+* Add support for defining SQL-invoked functions in plugins.
+* Added a new aggregation function SET_AGG<T> that returns ARRAY<T> - equivalent to ARRATY_AGG(DISTINCT).
+* COUNT(DISTINCT) suggests using approx_distinct instead.
+* Introducing NodeStatusService interface to find out if a worker is in maintenance mode or ready to take tasks. Default behavior is no op. But can be implemented and override the
+  behavior. Config controlling the behavior `node-status-service.enabled`.
+* Optional NodeStatusService to check Nodes status (i.e. Available/In Maintenance) through some external source and mark them Inactive if not available to process queries.

@@ -0,0 +1,62 @@
+=============
+Release 0.237
+=============
+
+General Changes
+_______________
+* Fix NPE in common sub-expression optimization triggered by CASE-WHEN expression.
+* Fix compiler failure with function type when common sub-expression optimization is enabled.
+* Add JSON format for `EXPLAIN` with type `LOGICAL` and `DISTRIBUTED`.
+* Add functions :func:`array_sum` and :func:`map_normalize`.
+* Add new session property ``warning_handling `` to control how warnings are handled. The options are ``SUPPRESS``, ``NORMAL`` and ``AS_ERROR``. The default value is ``NORMAL``.
+* Add support for Druid's basic and kerberos authentication.
+* Add support for defining SQL-invoked functions in plugins.
+* Added a new aggregation function SET_AGG<T> that returns ARRAY<T> - equivalent to ARRATY_AGG(DISTINCT).
+* COUNT(DISTINCT) suggests using approx_distinct instead.
+* Introducing NodeStatusService interface to find out if a worker is in maintenance mode or ready to take tasks. Default behavior is no op. But can be implemented and override the
+  behavior. Config controlling the behavior `node-status-service.enabled`.
+* Optional NodeStatusService to check Nodes status (i.e. Available/In Maintenance) through some external source and mark them Inactive if not available to process queries.
+* Support listing functions whose names match a specified pattern using the SHOW FUNCTION LIKE syntax.
+* TaskStatus JSON decoding improved about 15% CPU by making it leaner.

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,62 @@
+=============
+Release 0.237
+=============
+
+General Changes
+_______________
+* Fix NPE in common sub-expression optimization triggered by CASE-WHEN expression.
+* Fix compiler failure with function type when common sub-expression optimization is enabled.
+* Add JSON format for `EXPLAIN` with type `LOGICAL` and `DISTRIBUTED`.
+* Add functions :func:`array_sum` and :func:`map_normalize`.
+* Add new session property ``warning_handling `` to control how warnings are handled. The options are ``SUPPRESS``, ``NORMAL`` and ``AS_ERROR``. The default value is ``NORMAL``.
+* Add support for Druid's basic and kerberos authentication.
+* Add support for defining SQL-invoked functions in plugins.
+* Added a new aggregation function SET_AGG<T> that returns ARRAY<T> - equivalent to ARRATY_AGG(DISTINCT).
+* COUNT(DISTINCT) suggests using approx_distinct instead.
+* Introducing NodeStatusService interface to find out if a worker is in maintenance mode or ready to take tasks. Default behavior is no op. But can be implemented and override the
+  behavior. Config controlling the behavior `node-status-service.enabled`.
+* Optional NodeStatusService to check Nodes status (i.e. Available/In Maintenance) through some external source and mark them Inactive if not available to process queries.
+* Support listing functions whose names match a specified pattern using the SHOW FUNCTION LIKE syntax.
+* TaskStatus JSON decoding improved about 15% CPU by making it leaner.
+
+Cassandra Changes
+_________________
+* Fix missing Netty library introduced in version 0.229.
+
+Elasticsearch Changes
+_____________________
+* Fix predicate pushdown for Elasticsearch.
+* Add Elasticsearch array support using definitions in the _meta field.
+* Add support for AWS IAM authorization to Elasticsearch connector.
+* Add support for Elasticsearch query string syntax.
+* Add support for nested types in Elasticsearch.
+* Add support for querying Elasticsearch aliases.
+* Add system.nodes table to Elasticsearch.
+* Handle mixed-case columns in Elasticsearch.
+* Load tables dynamically in Elasticsearch.
+* Refresh Elasticsearch nodes periodically.
+* Update Elasticsearch connector to use Elasticsearch Http client.
+* Use shard primary host in Elasticsearch connector to save extra hop in Elasticsearch.
+
+Geospatial Changes
+__________________
+* Add `flatten_geometry_collections` function to recursively flatten `GeometryCollection`\s.

nodes.bodyText: I think the note is referring to GeometryCollection objects in plural, like GeometryCollections. The \ is added to prevent sphinx from raising an error.

+=============
+Release 0.237
+=============
+
+General Changes
+_______________
+* Fix NPE in common sub-expression optimization triggered by CASE-WHEN expression.
+* Fix compiler failure with function type when common sub-expression optimization is enabled.
+* Add JSON format for `EXPLAIN` with type `LOGICAL` and `DISTRIBUTED`.
+* Add functions :func:`array_sum` and :func:`map_normalize`.
+* Add new session property ``warning_handling `` to control how warnings are handled. The options are ``SUPPRESS``, ``NORMAL`` and ``AS_ERROR``. The default value is ``NORMAL``.
+* Add support for Druid's basic and kerberos authentication.
+* Add support for defining SQL-invoked functions in plugins.
+* Added a new aggregation function SET_AGG<T> that returns ARRAY<T> - equivalent to ARRATY_AGG(DISTINCT).
+* COUNT(DISTINCT) suggests using approx_distinct instead.
+* Introducing NodeStatusService interface to find out if a worker is in maintenance mode or ready to take tasks. Default behavior is no op. But can be implemented and override the
+  behavior. Config controlling the behavior `node-status-service.enabled`.
+* Optional NodeStatusService to check Nodes status (i.e. Available/In Maintenance) through some external source and mark them Inactive if not available to process queries.
+* Support listing functions whose names match a specified pattern using the SHOW FUNCTION LIKE syntax.
+* TaskStatus JSON decoding improved about 15% CPU by making it leaner.
+
+Cassandra Changes
+_________________
+* Fix missing Netty library introduced in version 0.229.
+
+Elasticsearch Changes
+_____________________
+* Fix predicate pushdown for Elasticsearch.
+* Add Elasticsearch array support using definitions in the _meta field.
+* Add support for AWS IAM authorization to Elasticsearch connector.
+* Add support for Elasticsearch query string syntax.
+* Add support for nested types in Elasticsearch.
+* Add support for querying Elasticsearch aliases.
+* Add system.nodes table to Elasticsearch.
+* Handle mixed-case columns in Elasticsearch.
+* Load tables dynamically in Elasticsearch.
+* Refresh Elasticsearch nodes periodically.
+* Update Elasticsearch connector to use Elasticsearch Http client.
+* Use shard primary host in Elasticsearch connector to save extra hop in Elasticsearch.
+
+Geospatial Changes
+__________________
+* Add `flatten_geometry_collections` function to recursively flatten `GeometryCollection`\s.

@@ -0,0 +1,62 @@
+=============
+Release 0.237
+=============
+
+General Changes
+_______________
+* Fix NPE in common sub-expression optimization triggered by ``CASE-WHEN`` expression.
+* Fix compiler failure with function type when common sub-expression optimization is enabled.
+* Improve TaskStatus JSON decoding by making it leaner.
+* Add JSON format for ``EXPLAIN`` with type ``LOGICAL`` and ``DISTRIBUTED``.
+* Add functions :func:`array_sum` and :func:`map_normalize`.
+* Add new session property ``warning_handling`` to control how warnings are handled. The options are ``SUPPRESS``, ``NORMAL`` and ``AS_ERROR``. The default value is ``NORMAL``.
+* Add support for Druid's basic and kerberos authentication.
+* Add support for defining SQL-invoked functions in plugins.
+* Add a new aggregation function :func:`set_agg` - equivalent to  ``ARRAY_AGG(DISTINCT x)``.
+* Add NodeStatusService interface to find out if a worker is in maintenance mode or ready to take tasks. Default behavior is no op and can be overridden. Config controlling the
+  behavior is ``node-status-service.enabled``.
+* Add suggestion to use :func:`approx_distinct` when using ``COUNT(DISTINCT x)``.
+* Add support for listing functions whose names match a specified pattern using the ``SHOW FUNCTION LIKE`` syntax.
+
+Cassandra Changes
+_________________
+* Fix missing Netty library introduced in version 0.229.
+
+Elasticsearch Changes
+_____________________
+* Fix predicate pushdown for Elasticsearch.
+* Improve Elasticsearch (save an extra hop) by using shard primary host in Elasticsearch connector.
+* Add Elasticsearch array support using definitions in the _meta field.
+* Add support for AWS IAM authorization to Elasticsearch connector.
+* Add support for Elasticsearch query string syntax.
+* Add support for nested types in Elasticsearch.
+* Add support for querying Elasticsearch aliases.
+* Add system.nodes table to Elasticsearch.
+* Add handling for mixed-case columns in Elasticsearch.
+* Add functionality to load tables dynamically in Elasticsearch.
+* Add functionality to refresh Elasticsearch nodes periodically.
+* Replace Elasticsearch TransportClient with Http client in Elasticsearch connector.
+
+

+  behavior is ``node-status-service.enabled``.

+* Add support for listing functions whose names match a specified pattern using the ``SHOW FUNCTION LIKE`` syntax.
+
+Cassandra Changes
+_________________
+* Fix missing Netty library introduced in version 0.229.
+
+Elasticsearch Changes
+_____________________
+* Fix predicate pushdown for Elasticsearch.
+* Improve Elasticsearch (save an extra hop) by using shard primary host in Elasticsearch connector.
+* Add Elasticsearch array support using definitions in the _meta field.
+* Add support for AWS IAM authorization to Elasticsearch connector.
+* Add support for Elasticsearch query string syntax.
+* Add support for nested types in Elasticsearch.
+* Add support for querying Elasticsearch aliases.
+* Add system.nodes table to Elasticsearch.
+* Add handling for mixed-case columns in Elasticsearch.
+* Add functionality to load tables dynamically in Elasticsearch.
+* Add functionality to refresh Elasticsearch nodes periodically.
+* Replace Elasticsearch TransportClient with Http client in Elasticsearch connector.

+=============
+Release 0.237
+=============
+
+General Changes
+_______________
+* Fix NPE in common sub-expression optimization triggered by ``CASE-WHEN`` expression.
+* Fix compiler failure with function type when common sub-expression optimization is enabled.
+* Improve TaskStatus JSON decoding by making it leaner.
+* Add JSON format for ``EXPLAIN`` with type ``LOGICAL`` and ``DISTRIBUTED``.
+* Add functions :func:`array_sum` and :func:`map_normalize`.
+* Add new session property ``warning_handling`` to control how warnings are handled. The options are ``SUPPRESS``, ``NORMAL`` and ``AS_ERROR``. The default value is ``NORMAL``.
+* Add support for Druid's basic and kerberos authentication.
+* Add support for defining SQL-invoked functions in plugins.
+* Add a new aggregation function :func:`set_agg` - equivalent to  ``ARRAY_AGG(DISTINCT x)``.
+* Add NodeStatusService interface to find out if a worker is in maintenance mode or ready to take tasks. Default behavior is no op and can be overridden. Config controlling the
+  behavior is ``node-status-service.enabled``.
+* Add suggestion to use :func:`approx_distinct` when using ``COUNT(DISTINCT x)``.
+* Add support for listing functions whose names match a specified pattern using the ``SHOW FUNCTION LIKE`` syntax.
+
+Cassandra Changes
+_________________

+

@@ -0,0 +1,61 @@
+=============
+Release 0.237
+=============
+
+General Changes
+_______________
+* Fix NPE in common sub-expression optimization triggered by ``CASE-WHEN`` expression.
+* Fix compiler failure with function type when common sub-expression optimization is enabled.
+* Improve TaskStatus JSON decoding by making it leaner.
+* Add JSON format for ``EXPLAIN`` with type ``LOGICAL`` and ``DISTRIBUTED``.
+* Add functions :func:`array_sum` and :func:`map_normalize`.
+* Add new session property ``warning_handling`` to control how warnings are handled. The options are ``SUPPRESS``, ``NORMAL`` and ``AS_ERROR``. The default value is ``NORMAL``.
+* Add support for Druid's basic and kerberos authentication.
+* Add support for defining SQL-invoked functions in plugins.
+* Add a new aggregation function :func:`set_agg` - equivalent to  ``ARRAY_AGG(DISTINCT x)``.
+* Add NodeStatusService interface to find out if a worker is in maintenance mode or ready to take tasks. Default behavior is no op and can be overridden. Config controlling the
+  behavior is ``node-status-service.enabled``.
+* Add suggestion to use :func:`approx_distinct` when using ``COUNT(DISTINCT x)``.
+* Add support for listing functions whose names match a specified pattern using the ``SHOW FUNCTION LIKE`` syntax.
+
+Cassandra Changes
+_________________
+* Fix missing Netty library introduced in version 0.229.
+
+Elasticsearch Changes
+_____________________
+* Fix predicate pushdown for Elasticsearch.
+* Improve Elasticsearch (save an extra hop) by using shard primary host in Elasticsearch connector.
+* Add Elasticsearch array support using definitions in the _meta field.
+* Add support for AWS IAM authorization to Elasticsearch connector.
+* Add support for Elasticsearch query string syntax.
+* Add support for nested types in Elasticsearch.
+* Add support for querying Elasticsearch aliases.
+* Add system.nodes table to Elasticsearch.
+* Add handling for mixed-case columns in Elasticsearch.
+* Add functionality to load tables dynamically in Elasticsearch.
+* Add functionality to refresh Elasticsearch nodes periodically.
+* Replace Elasticsearch TransportClient with Http client in Elasticsearch connector.
+
+Geospatial Changes
+__________________
+* Add :func:`flatten_geometry_collections` function to recursively flatten GeometryCollections.
+
+Hive Changes
+________________
+* Add functionality to specify cache quota with respect to a scope. A scope could be at global, schema, table, or partition level. Cache quota prevents queries scanning too much
+  data to disrupt cache locality. Such queries can only use the cache within their own scopes. Cache quota now only works with ``FILE_MERGE`` cache. Turn it on with config
+  ``cache.cache-quota-scope`` and ``cache.default-cache-quota``.
+
+Verifier Changes
+________________
+* Fix an internal error when session properties of a control or a test query contains ``query_max_execution_time``.
+* Fix auto-resolution of checksum query failure due to query complexity.
+* Add control query IDs, test query IDs, and peak total memory to verification outputs.
+* Add support to resubmit verification for ``CLUSTER_OUT_OF_MEMORY`` and ``ADMINISTRATIVELY_PREEMPTED`` errors.
+* Add support to retry ``DESCRIBE`` queries failed with ``TIME_LIMIT_EXCEEDED``.
+
+Resource Groups Changes
+_______________________
+* Fix existing resource group to handle transition of leaf resource group to internal and vice versa.
+* Add Resource Group Versioning.

+* Fix NPE in common sub-expression optimization triggered by ``CASE-WHEN`` expression.
+* Fix compiler failure with function type when common sub-expression optimization is enabled.
+* Improve coordinator RPC performance by removing unused entries from ``TaskStatus``.

+=============
+Release 0.237
+=============
+
+General Changes
+_______________
+* Fix NPE in common sub-expression optimization triggered by ``CASE-WHEN`` expression.
+* Fix compiler failure with function type when common sub-expression optimization is enabled.
+* Improve coordinator RPC performance by removing unused entries from ``TaskStatus``.
+* Add JSON format for ``EXPLAIN`` with type ``LOGICAL`` and ``DISTRIBUTED``.
+* Add functions :func:`array_sum`, :func:`map_normalize` and :func:`set_agg`.
+* Add session property ``warning_handling`` to control how warnings are handled. The options are ``SUPPRESS``, ``NORMAL`` and ``AS_ERROR``. The default value is ``NORMAL``.
+* Add support for defining SQL-invoked functions in plugins.
+* Add ability to control which worker can receive tasks by implementing the ``NodeStatusService`` interface. See :pr:`14535`
+* Add warning to use :func:`approx_distinct` when using ``COUNT(DISTINCT x)``.
+* Add support for listing functions whose names match a specified pattern using the ``SHOW FUNCTION LIKE`` syntax.
+* Add :func:`flatten_geometry_collections` function to recursively flatten GeometryCollections.
+
+Cassandra Connector Changes
+___________________________
+* Fix missing Netty library introduced in version 0.229 that causes the Cassandra connector to fail to load and queries to fail.
+
+Druid Connector Changes
+_______________________
+* Add support for Druid's basic and kerberos authentication.
+
+Elasticsearch Connector Changes
+_______________________________
+* Fix predicate pushdown for Elasticsearch.
+* Improve Elasticsearch (save an extra hop) by using shard primary host in Elasticsearch connector.
+* Add Elasticsearch array support using definitions in the _meta field.
+* Add support for AWS IAM authorization to Elasticsearch connector.
+* Add support for Elasticsearch query string syntax.
+* Add support for nested types in Elasticsearch.
+* Add support for querying Elasticsearch aliases.
+* Add system.nodes table to Elasticsearch.
+* Add handling for mixed-case columns in Elasticsearch.
+* Add functionality to load tables dynamically in Elasticsearch.
+* Add functionality to refresh Elasticsearch nodes periodically.
